articles.title: Techies will continue to leave TCS at a higher rate for a few more quarters and later cool off
articles.description: TCS announced that its employee attrition rate continued to rise during the January-March quarter as well, reaching 17.4%. However, the company’s management
articles.content:
The rate of employees leaving information technology (IT) firms continues to remain high as opportunities across the sector are growing with high digital acceptance across industries.
